about.title: ABOUT US
about.description: QuikHouse is the factory responsible for the development and production of the SteelPanel construction system, an industrialized technology that offers agility, resistance and precision in civil construction. To bring your projects to reality with excellence, QuikHouse has the strategic alliance of Dreams House, a company specialized in the execution of residential and commercial works. Together, they offer a complete solution: from the manufacturing of panels to the final assembly on site.

system.title: STEELPANEL SYSTEM
system.description: SteelPanel is an exclusive construction system from QuikHouse. It consists of self-supporting metallic panels made of galvanized steel that fulfill structural and divisory functions. Being prefabricated, they guarantee speed in installation, high resistance, durability and flexibility to apply various finishes. It is an ideal solution for buildings up to two stories, both residential and commercial, with the quality guarantee of an industrialized system.

lifestyle.title: WE DON'T BUILD HOUSES, WE TRANSFORM YOUR LIFESTYLE
lifestyle.description: Choosing to build with the SteelPanel system is opting for a superior experience from day one. We offer efficiency in deadlines, high-quality finishes and total flexibility in designs. Each project adapts to your dreams, needs and lifestyle, with personalized solutions and attention to every detail. Our systems allow for clean, fast and precise installation, ideal for those who value innovation, comfort and durability in their investment. More than building structures, we create unique spaces that reflect who you are and how you want to live.

sustainability.title: SUSTAINABILITY
sustainability.subtitle: The QuikHouse system is an industrialized and productive way that eliminates the use of cement and mortar in its composition, significantly reducing energy consumption and promoting sustainable construction of the future.

cost_competitive.title: COMPETITIVE COST
cost_competitive.description: QuikHouse builds with maximum economy aligned with sustainable practices, offering efficient and profitable solutions for each project.

execution_time.title: SHORTER EXECUTION TIME
execution_time.description: The QuikHouse system is a simplified model that makes the entire construction process faster and with superior final results.

organization.title: EFFICIENT ORGANIZATION
organization.description: The completely intelligible assembly eliminates additional labor costs and avoids material waste on site.
